snippet: The suspension of the negotiations immediately raised concerns that the nightly demonstrations that have sometimes paralyzed cities in the province would increase in intensity.
abstract: Talks aimed at ending a 16-week strike over tuition increases by students in Quebec collapse, immediately raising concerns that the demonstrations held nightly in cities throughout the province, particularly Montreal, would increase in intensity.
lead_paragraph: The suspension of the negotiations immediately raised concerns that the nightly demonstrations that have sometimes paralyzed cities in the province would increase in intensity.

headline.main: Canada: Talks Over Tuition Increases and Student Strike Collapse in Quebec
headline.print_headline: Canada: Talks Over Tuition Increases And Student Strike Collapse in Quebec
